question: Channel capacity with SNR=0.5 (linear) and bandwidth B=1 MHz. Compute C in Mbit/s.
Free-space constant K=(λ/(4πd0))^2 with d0=1 m. For f_c=1 GHz compute K.

For coherent OOK with A=1, N0=0.5, P1=0.2, P2=0.8, compute V_T.

For RC shaping with α=0.3 and bandwidth 41.6 kHz, find max QPSK bit rate.
Energy of s(t)=A[U(t)-U(t-T/3)]. Compute E.

A 2ASK (coherent) system has symbol rate R_s=2×10^6 baud, received amplitude A=2 mV, and double-sided noise PSD n0=1×10^{-10} W/Hz. Estimate BER using P_b=Q(\sqrt{E_b/N0}) and E_b=A^2/(4R_s), N0=n0/2.
A PM signal is s(t)=5 cos(2π·2 MHz·t + 3 cos(2π·5 kHz·t)). Find the maximum phase deviation.
DBPSK over AWGN. Find required E_b/N_0 (in dB) for BER P_b=10^{-6}.
For a bipolar (polar) NRZ system, Pb=Q(\sqrt{2S/N}). If S/N=20 (linear), estimate Pb.
For M-ary orthogonal, Eb/N0 limit is 2 ln2. Express required Eb/N0 in dB.

An m-sequence has degree n=8. Find period.
TDM-PCM. 20 channels, each sampled at 8 kHz and encoded with 8 bits. Find multiplexed rate R_b.
Convert 30 dBm to watts.
A QPSK system uses raised-cosine with α=1 and must fit B=100 kHz. Find maximum bit rate.
Compute RTT for LEO altitude 1200 km with c=3×10^8 m/s. Use one-way distance 1.2×10^6 m.
Shannon capacity. B=50 MHz, SNR=0.1 (linear). Compute C (Mbps).
Chip rate is 2 Mcps and m-sequence period is 31 chips. Find period time.

TDM multiplexing. A TDM link supports symbol rate R_s=9.6×10^6 baud (assume 1 bit/symbol). Each of l analog channels has f_H=3 kHz and is PCM encoded with n=8 bits/sample at Nyquist. How many channels l can be multiplexed?
Spectral efficiency η=0.5 log2(M). If η=2, find M.

For OFDM Rayleigh model Pr(r>A0)=exp(-A0^2), find A0 for clipping probability 5%.
OOK coherent BER with matched filter (equal priors). If E_b/N_0=12 (linear) and P_b=Q(\sqrt{E_b/N_0}), compute P_b.
Two-user uplink: P1=10 mW, P2=5 mW, noise N=1 mW, B=20 MHz. User 1 decoded first. Compute capacity C1.
Timing error constraint: |ε|/T=0.33/√(10K·E_b/N0). For K=2 and E_b/N0=12 dB, compute |ε|/T.

Compute mean received power needed for outage 0.5%. Threshold 15 dBm, σ=4 dB.

For the A-law PCM primary group (E1) with sampling rate 8 kHz, find the frame duration.

Compute noise spectral density from measured SNR. A coherent DSB-SC link has transmitted signal power S_i=5 kW at demod input, message bandwidth f_m=4 kHz. Output SNR is 500. For coherent DSB-SC, S_o/N_o=2(S_i/N_i). Assume ideal BPF passing both sidebands so N_i=2 P_n f_m with flat two-sided PSD P_n. Find P_n (W/Hz).

AM spectrum line magnitudes. s(t)=A_c(1+\mu\cos(2\pi f_m t))\cos(2\pi f_c t) with A_c=4 V, \mu=0.6. Find the magnitudes of the impulses in S(f) at ±f_c and at ±(f_c±f_m) (impulse representation in Hz).
